thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Conveniently Located, Comfortable Hotel
thread.title_full: Conveniently Located, Comfortable Hotel - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Terrell Y
title: Conveniently Located, Comfortable Hotel
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The hotel is very clean and comfortable, as well as having a proximal location to the theatre district. We were close to subway stations so we were able to fully take advantage of the New York Experience.
